document.heading: Broadcast Industry Contracting Freedom Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-258, the “Broadcast Industry Contracting Freedom Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-812, which was referred to the Committee on the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 2002, and December 3, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-555 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-258 became effective on March 27, 2003.
